metadata.description: In the spirit of Astroboy, Gigantor and Giant Robo comes retro 1960's manga action for the new age!  Kip Fenwick is a secret operative fighting against a nefarious organization bent on world domination.  When Kip's essence is transferred into the body of a giant robot, it's now up to Ultrabot Go Go Go! to take on the fantastic enemies of the world in the most action-packed one-shot you've ever read!
metadata.name: Ultrabot Go Go Go!
